name: Floppy Block
description:
Navigate the Floppy Block through three obstacle-filled levels!

Developed in a week for the 1-Button Jam 2021 in November 2021

Controls

Menu Navigation:

  • Button Navigation: Mouse and/or W, A, S, D, UP, LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT keys 
  • Selections: SPACE and ENTER keys
  • Retuning to previous menu: ESCAPE key

Game:

  • Jump: SPACE. In order to overcome precision-based obstacles, the SPACE key may be held to continually jump upon hitting the ground.
  • Pause: ESCAPE
